entry.title: Heavy Snow Warning - Orange
entry.summary: On top of the snow that has already accumulated, expect 3 to 6 cm of snow to settle above 800 metres, and lesser amounts lower down. Snow is expected to clear from the south this afternoon. Impact: Travel disruption and damage to trees and powerlines possible. Cold conditions may cause stress for livestock. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal. Changes: Otago removed from Warning.
